Partnership Benefits

Discover how partnering with Cufy can enhance your campus community and student engagement.

Verified Student Community

Students from partner colleges get verified badges and priority matching within their institution.

Campus Events Integration

Promote college events, festivals, and activities directly to students interested in attending.

Student Engagement Analytics

Anonymous insights into student social patterns and campus community engagement levels.

Safety & Support Resources

Dedicated support channels and safety resources specifically for your college community.

Partnership Levels

Choose the partnership level that best fits your institution's needs and goals.

Community Partner

Free
  • College verification for students
  • Basic analytics dashboard
  • Community support resources
  • Event promotion (limited)
Most Popular

Campus Partner

Custom
  • Priority verification process
  • Enhanced analytics and insights
  • Unlimited event promotion
  • Dedicated support manager
  • Custom college branding
  • Student safety resources

Strategic Partner

Enterprise
  • Complete platform integration
  • Advanced engagement analytics
  • Co-branded experiences
  • Research collaboration opportunities
  • Priority feature development
  • Executive relationship management
